name: app-header
readme:
app-header component

  • Use [role="header"] for enhanced accessibility.
  • Use quick menu (skip nav) for enhanced accessibility.
html:
<!-- app-header component -->
<header role="banner" class="app-header" data-component="app-header">
    <a class="app-logo" href="../..//views/_guide-index/_guide-index.html" rel="home" title="to homepage" data-component="app-logo">
    <!-- link to home: http://microformats.org/wiki/rel-home -->
    <h1>
        <!-- vector image with bitmap fallback: https://twitter.com/scottjehl/status/369190249437483008 -->
        <!-- specify image dimensions for performance: http://www.feedthebot.com/pagespeed/image-dimensions.html -->
        <img alt="[Logo]"
             src="../../assets/components/app-logo/demo-logo.svg"
             onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='../../assets/components/app-logo/demo-logo.png';"
             width="75" height="75"
             >
        
        Demo Project
    </h1>
</a>

    <!-- Quick menu (skipnav) to directly jump to specific sections: http://www.jimthatcher.com/skipnav.htm -->
    <nav class="app-header-quick-menu">
        <h2 class="a11y-sr-only">Quick menu</h2>
        <ul class="flat-list">
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#content">Jump to content</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#main-menu">Jump to main menu</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#search">Jump to search</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#meta-menu">Jump to meta menu</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#user">Jump to user menu</a></li>
        </ul>
    </nav>
    <!-- search-menu component -->
<!-- Mark search controls for enhanced a11y: http://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria/roles#search -->
<div role="search" class="search-menu"
     data-search-menu
     data-expandible-open-on-focus="true"
     data-expandible-close-on-blur="true"
     data-component="search-menu">
    <a id="search" rel="search" href="/views/search/search.html"
       class="menu-link"
       data-expandible-handle="toggle">
        <span class="search-menu-open  app-icon-search"></span>
        <span class="search-menu-close app-icon-cross"></span>
        <span class="a11y-sr-only">Search</span>
    </a>
    <form method="GET" action="/views/search/search.html"
          class="search-menu-form"
          data-expandible-content>
        <label>
            <span class="a11y-sr-only">Keywords</span>
            <input type="search" name="q" placeholder="keyword(s)" />
        </label>
        <button>
            <span class="app-icon-search"></span>
            <span class="a11y-sr-only">Search front-end-guide</span>
        </button>
    </form>
</div>
<!-- /search-menu -->

</header>
<!-- /app-header -->
css:
.a11y-sr-only,
.a11y-kb-only {
  border: 0;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  height: 1px;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
}
.a11y-kb-only:active,
.a11y-kb-only:focus {
  clip: auto;
  height: auto;
  margin: 0;
  overflow: visible;
  position: static;
  width: auto;
}
.icon-search:before {
  content: "search";
}
.icon-close:before {
  content: "x";
}
.flat-list {
  list-style: none;
  padding-left: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
.flat-list li {
  padding-left: 0;
}
.flat-list li:before {
  content: '';
}
.list-inline {
  list-style: none;
  padding-left: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
.list-inline li {
  padding-left: 0;
}
.list-inline li:before {
  content: '';
}
.list-inline > li {
  display: inline-block;
  padding-left: 5px;
  padding-right: 5px;
}
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
*:before,
*:after {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
html {
  font-size: 10px;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
body {
  font-family: Arial;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  line-height: 1.5em;
  color: black;
  width: 90%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0;
}
a:link {
  color: #428bca;
}
a:visited {
  color: #245682;
}
a:hover,
a:focus {
  color: #92bce0;
}
/* app-logo component */
.app-logo img {
  width: 1.5em;
  height: auto;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1000px) {
  .app-logo img {
    width: 2.5em;
  }
}
a img {
  border: none;
}
/* /app-logo component */
.search-menu {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
}
.search-menu .search-menu-open {
  display: inherit;
}
.search-menu .search-menu-close {
  display: none;
}
@media print {
  .search-menu {
    display: none;
  }
}
.search-menu-form {
  display: none;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  white-space: nowrap;
  padding: .5em;
}
.search-menu.is-expanded {
  background-color: #5bc0de;
}
.search-menu.is-expanded .search-menu-open {
  display: none;
}
.search-menu.is-expanded .search-menu-close {
  display: inherit;
}
.search-menu.is-expanded .search-menu-form {
  display: block;
  background-color: #5bc0de;
}
.app-icon-search {
  content: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M15.5 14h-.79l-.28-.27c.98-1.14 1.57-2.62 1.57-4.23 0-3.59-2.91-6.5-6.5-6.5s-6.5 2.91-6.5 6.5 2.91 6.5 6.5 6.5c1.61 0 3.09-.59 4.23-1.57l.27.28v.79l5 4.99 1.49-1.49-4.99-5zm-6 0c-2.49 0-4.5-2.01-4.5-4.5s2.01-4.5 4.5-4.5 4.5 2.01 4.5 4.5-2.01 4.5-4.5 4.5z"/><path d="M0 0h24v24h-24z" fill="none"/></svg>');
}
.app-icon-close {
  content: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19 6.41l-1.41-1.41-5.59 5.59-5.59-5.59-1.41 1.41 5.59 5.59-5.59 5.59 1.41 1.41 5.59-5.59 5.59 5.59 1.41-1.41-5.59-5.59z"/><path d="M0 0h24v24h-24z" fill="none"/></svg>');
}
.app-header {
  *zoom: 1;
  position: relative;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #428bca;
}
.app-header:before,
.app-header:after {
  display: table;
  content: "";
}
.app-header:after {
  clear: both;
}
.app-header .app-logo {
  float: left;
}
.app-header .meta-menu {
  float: left;
}
.app-header .user-menu {
  float: right;
}
.app-header .search-menu {
  float: right;
}
.app-header-quick-menu {
  position: absolute;
  left: 1em;
  top: 5em;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=../../components/app-header/app-header.css.map */
template:
<!-- app-header component -->
<header role="banner" class="app-header" data-component="app-header">
    {% include "components/app-logo/app-logo.html" %}

    <!-- Quick menu (skipnav) to directly jump to specific sections: http://www.jimthatcher.com/skipnav.htm -->
    <nav class="app-header-quick-menu">
        <h2 class="a11y-sr-only">Quick menu</h2>
        <ul class="flat-list">
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#content">Jump to content</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#main-menu">Jump to main menu</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#search">Jump to search</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#meta-menu">Jump to meta menu</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#user">Jump to user menu</a></li>
        </ul>
    </nav>
    {% include "components/search-menu/search-menu.html" %}

</header>
<!-- /app-header -->
less:
@import (reference) "../app-core-styles/styles/mixins/clearfix";
@import (reference) "../app-core-styles/styles/variables";
@import (once) "../app-core-styles/app-core-styles";
@import (once) "../app-logo/app-logo";
@import (once) "../search-menu/search-menu";

.app-header {
	.clearfix();
	position: relative;
	border-bottom: 1px solid @brand-highlight;
	.app-logo    { float: left; }
	.meta-menu   { float: left; }
	.user-menu   { float: right; }
	.search-menu { float: right; }
}
.app-header-quick-menu {
	position: absolute;
	left: 1em;
	top: 5em;
}
js:
define([
	'components/search-menu'
], function(searchMenu){

});
